description.value:
This +1 striking returning trident is made of an ancient black metal that glistens unnaturally and is cold to the touch. The prongs of this trident drip with metallic lake water. Strikes with the Devil's Trident trigger the weaknesses of any creature with a weakness to water.

Activate r Command

Trigger You critically hit a creature

Effect The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|traits:disease,virulent] save or become infected with sewer haze.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect The trident casts 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Quench] with a DC of 25 and a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+15 #Quench Counteract Modifier]]{+15}. You can Sustain the Spell as normal.

Activate 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon the corrupted power of the trident to stay a foe. Attempt a Strike. On a hit, the trident casts 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze] on the target (DC 25). If the Strike was a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1} even if it critically succeeds at the save.

Sewer Haze

disease

virulent

Many healers and alchemists suspect that sewer haze has a supernatural origin, but the study is so unpleasant that research has made little progress.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|traits:disease,virulent]

Onset 2 days

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} and stupefied 2 (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} (1 day)
